20 void RobotinoController::delegate_to_component(MoveForwardCapabilityParameters parameters) {
21  ROS_INFO("Received command from FFM, sending forward to base component");
22  const std::string capability_name = "MoveForward";
23  MoveForwardCapability& c =
24  dynamic_cast<MoveForwardCapability&>(baseComponent_.find_capability_by_name(capability_name));
25  c.perform(parameters);
26 }

28 void RobotinoController::throttle_to_safe_speed() {
29  update_speed(0.2, 0.3);
30 }
31 
32 void RobotinoController::go_back_to_normal_speed() {
33  update_speed(0.6, 1.0);
34 }
35 
36 void RobotinoController::update_speed(double linear, double angular) {
37  dynamic_reconfigure::ReconfigureRequest request;
38  dynamic_reconfigure::ReconfigureResponse response;
39  dynamic_reconfigure::DoubleParameter dyn_max_linear_vel;
40  dynamic_reconfigure::DoubleParameter dyn_min_linear_vel;
41  dynamic_reconfigure::DoubleParameter dyn_max_angular_vel;
42  dynamic_reconfigure::DoubleParameter dyn_min_angular_vel;
43  dynamic_reconfigure::Config config;
44  dyn_max_linear_vel.name = "dyn_max_linear_vel";
45  dyn_min_linear_vel.name = "dyn_min_linear_vel";
46  dyn_max_angular_vel.name = "dyn_max_angular_vel";
47  dyn_min_angular_vel.name = "dyn_min_angular_vel";
48  dyn_max_linear_vel.value = linear;
49  dyn_min_linear_vel.value = 0.01;
50  dyn_max_angular_vel.value = angular;
51  dyn_min_angular_vel.value = 0.01;
52  config.doubles.push_back(dyn_max_linear_vel);
53  config.doubles.push_back(dyn_min_linear_vel);
54  config.doubles.push_back(dyn_max_angular_vel);
55  config.doubles.push_back(dyn_min_angular_vel);
56  request.config = config;
57  while(!ros::service::call("/robotino_node/set_parameters", request, response)) {
58  ROS_INFO("Could not update parameters. Retrying...");
59  }
60 }
